task.shortdesc: This procedure is meant to help a user restrict access the university has to your directory information

taskbody.prereq: You will need access to the internet, MyPack Portal access, and a phone for duo-autherntication if accessing from a laptop or computer.

context.p: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), students have the right to restrict all or part of their directory information, including their email, enrollment status (full or part-time), major, field of study, and more.
If you wish to restrict this information, then you may do so in MyPack Portal

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Privacy Restrictions".
Select "Restrict" under the directory field you would like to restrcit access to,OR select "Clear" if you wish to release the restriction for that field.

If you choose a Full Privacy block, you can grant exceptions for certain publications by clicking the Full Block field, checking the "Restricted" box, and selecting the Exceptions you would like to grant.
Be sure to click the green "Save" button to save your changes.
